p: Cases data were obtained from the Notifiable Diseases Information System (SINAN, Sistema de Informação de Agravos de Notificação) via the Health Information Department (DATASUS, Departamento de Informática do Sistema Único de Saúde) run by the Brazilian Ministry of Health. Monthly dengue data were extracted from January 2001 to August 2016 for each municipality (n = 5570). Cases were confirmed by clinical and epidemiological evidence, and approximately 30% of them were also laboratory-confirmed [ 24].
